content.raw:
I updated the comment in 8dfa3f387fa9.

As for that comparison, I don't foresee any problem.  The constant that we're defining here is different from the strings that are being compared there.  As the [warning](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/c3ce7119a8aa2488f9d8b7a0c9bb4b2841a71e7d/drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins/src/AtlasPlugin.cpp#cl-1696) just below says, the string-based method of robot control is deprecated, in favor of AtlasSimInterfaceCommand.
content.html:
I updated the comment in 8dfa3f387fa9.

As for that comparison, I don't foresee any problem. The constant that we're defining here is different from the strings that are being compared there. As the warning just below says, the string-based method of robot control is deprecated, in favor of AtlasSimInterfaceCommand.
